unit.comment: /* * X.509 certificate writing * * Copyright (C) 2006-2015, ARM Limited, All Rights Reserved * SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 * * Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License"); you may * not use this file except in compliance with the License. * You may obtain a copy of the License at * * http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 * * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software * distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT * WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. * See the License for the specific language governing permissions and * limitations under the License. * * This file is part of mbed TLS (https://tls.mbed.org) */
/* * References: * - certificates: RFC 5280, updated by RFC 6818 * - CSRs: PKCS#10 v1.7 aka RFC 2986 * - attributes: PKCS#9 v2.0 aka RFC 2985 */
/* Implementation that should never be optimized out by the compiler */

function.name: mbedtls_zeroize
mbedtls_x509write_crt_init
mbedtls_x509write_crt_free
mbedtls_x509write_crt_set_version
mbedtls_x509write_crt_set_md_alg
mbedtls_x509write_crt_set_subject_key
mbedtls_x509write_crt_set_issuer_key
mbedtls_x509write_crt_set_subject_name
mbedtls_x509write_crt_set_issuer_name
mbedtls_x509write_crt_set_serial
mbedtls_x509write_crt_set_validity
mbedtls_x509write_crt_set_extension
mbedtls_x509write_crt_set_basic_constraints
mbedtls_x509write_crt_set_subject_key_identifier
mbedtls_x509write_crt_set_authority_key_identifier
mbedtls_x509write_crt_set_key_usage
mbedtls_x509write_crt_set_ns_cert_type
x509_write_time
function.parameter_list: ( unsigned char **p, unsigned char *start, const char *time, size_t size )

function.name: mbedtls_x509write_crt_der
function.parameter_list: ( mbedtls_x509write_cert *ctx, unsigned char *buf, size_t size, int (*f_rng)(void *, unsigned char *, size_t), void *p_rng )

function.name: mbedtls_x509write_crt_pem
function.parameter_list: ( mbedtls_x509write_cert *crt, unsigned char *buf, size_t size, int (*f_rng)(void *, unsigned char *, size_t), void *p_rng )
